dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5344 IH: Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Program Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lynch (for himself and Mr. Nunn of Iowa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Act to extend the Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Pilot Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Program Act.
Section 9703 of the Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Act is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by striking ‘Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Pilot Program’ and inserting Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Program;
in subsection (a)(1), by striking Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Pilot Program and inserting ‘Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Program;
in subsection (g)(1), by striking for 3 years; and
by striking subsection (i) and inserting the following:

subsection.text: This section shall cease to have any force or effect after the end of the 7-year period beginning on the date of enactment of the Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Rewards Program Act.
